song.title: Good Good Father
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .G Gsus G Gsus
[1] .G/B I've heard a thousand stories . Gsus Of what they think You're like || .G/B But I've heard the tender whisper . Gsus Of love in the dead of night || . C G You tell me that Your pleased . Am7 D And that I'm never alone
[C] . C You're a good, good Father . G Am7 It's who You are, it's who You are . D It's who You are || . C And I'm loved by You . G Am7 D It's who I am, it's who I am, it's who I am
[B] .C Em You are perfect in all of Your ways .Am7 G You are perfect in all of Your ways .C Em D You are perfect in all of Your ways to us ---
[2] .G I've seen many searching . Gsus For answers far and wide || .G But I know we're all searching . Gsus For answers only You provide || . C G Because You know just what we need . Am7 D Before we say a word
[3] .G Love so undeniable .G I can hardly speak .G Peace so unexplainable .G I can hardly think || . C G/F# As You call me deeper still . Am7 G/F# As You call me deeper still . C G/F# As You call me deeper still . Am7 D Into love love love
song.author: Chris Tomlin
